title: How to Remove a Turmeric Stain Using an Essential Oil

steps.headline: Select the oil.
steps.description: There are two possible essential oils that are appropriate for use on a turmeric stain - either eucalyptus oil or lavender oil. Use whichever you can source most easily.

steps.headline: Massage the oil into the turmeric stain.
Wash the item of clothing as usual.
steps.description: Hang it out to dry, preferably in full sunlight.

steps.headline: Once dry, check the item.
